metadata.title: CVE-2021-37232 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow vulnerability occurs in Atomicparsley20210124.204813.840499f through APar_read64() in src/util.cpp due to thelack of buffer size of uint32_buffer while reading more bytes inAPar_read64.

criterions.comment: atomicparsley: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
